name: Defenders of Annadale
description:
This is an upcoming PvP focused RPG that has 4v4 combat in an arena.
Players choose between 6 professions.
Warrior, Mage, Healer, Ranger, Druid, Rogue.
They have the ability equip 8 skills that their profession allows.
Playes will mix and match different skills to make creative and unique builds that show off their playstyle
